Parse KEGG pathway file

Source: R/kegg_parsing.R
parse_kegg_keg.Rd

Parses a KEGG pathway file (.keg) and extracts gene names for each pathway.

Usage

parse_kegg_keg(file_path = "sce00001.keg", verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

file_path

Character string specifying the path to the KEGG pathway file. Default is "sce00001.keg".

verbose

Logical. Whether to print progress messages (default: TRUE).

Value

A list where each element is a character vector of gene names for a pathway.

Examples

# \donttest{
pathways <- parse_kegg_keg(file_path = "sce00001.keg")
#> Warning: cannot open file 'sce00001.keg': No such file or directory
#> Error in file(con, "r"): cannot open the connection
# }
